Description:
Sofa Frame Assembler (UK Visa)England, UKDo you want to work with one of the largest and market leading Upholstery manufacturers in the UK? Our client operates out of four UK production sites occupying in excess of 450,000 square feet of production, design and office space, employing over 1300 people in the UK.Salary: £26,793 per year + bonusShift Pattern: Various shifts are availableBenefits:Visa Sponsorship
Competitive Salary
Professional Development
Supportive Work Environment
Work-Life Balance
Diversity and Inclusion
FULL RELOCATION SUPPORT!Key Responsibilities:Cursory check on components to ensure not faulty
To assemble a variety of units, as per specification
To clean assembly jigs after use
To sand down any raw edges on frame
To test completed frame on flat bed
To report any faulty parts to sorter/supervisor
To date and ID stamp frame
To fill out appropriate work sheet and hand to supervisor
To perform any other reasonable duties requested and assist in other departments as and when requiredIf you’ve got the necessary skills and want to be considered for this role straight away, we’d love to hear from you!We offer a full relocation service to the best talent and stand by our “With you all the way” motto.Take the next step in your career with us!Apply Today!Skills
